snippet.title: [Trailer] Indirection - A unique platformer where you can only move forward!
snippet.description:
This is the gameplay trailer for my game - Indirection!
Created over the course of 2 months, this game a fun directional puzzle adventure with much to offer.
Releasing October 25th, 2021 for PC on Steam and Itch.io.
